Uses of Interface
mireka.transmission.Transmitter

Packages that use Transmitter
mireka.destination Contains Destination core classes; destinations represents the different ways of delivering a mail received in an incoming mail transaction, e.g. putting the mail into a POP3 maildrop or transmitting it to a remote domain. 
mireka.forward Provides support for address expansion for multiple delivery. 
mireka.list Provides a simple mailing list, which can be used for small, closed, internal mailing lists, if a full mailing list manager software is not available. 
mireka.transmission Provides the reliable transmission service API and the corresponding TransmitterDestination destination. 
mireka.transmission.queuing Provides a reliable, queuing Transmitter implementation.
